name: Rooms (nokk)
description:
This is a test for my BA Thesis "What happened here? Digital Architecture: Telling a story using only objects"

This demo contains 3 Rooms, you can enter the next one via the door you are facing at the start.

If you happen to stumble upon this Project randomly, you can play this demo, it takes about 5-10 minutes. 

If you want to, you can fill out this survey after playing, anyone can participate: https://forms.gle/LGc3drTdrWadTxkc7
